meanings.definition: The action or process of coagulating.
meanings.sent1: The coagencies of the ingredients turned the liquid into a solid.
meanings.sent2: After adding heat, the coagencies of the mixture caused it to thicken.
meanings.sent3: The coagencies of the pudding made it look like a wobbly mountain.
meanings.sent4: The coagencies of the glue transformed it from runny to sticky in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The coagencies of the paint created a beautiful texture on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The coagencies of the milk resulted in a solid block of cheese.
meanings.sent2: The coagencies of the blood formed a clot to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent3: The coagencies of the jello made it bounce like a rubber ball.
meanings.sent4: The coagencies of the snow created a slippery surface on the road.
meanings.sent5: The coagencies of the batter made the pancakes fluffy and delicious.
